meanings.definition: A Mexican dish made of mashed avocado mixed with chopped onion, tomatoes, chili peppers, and seasoning.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat guacamoles with my tacos.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the guacamoles with chips.
meanings.sent3: The guacamoles at the restaurant were so good, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her guacamoles recipe was a secret weapon at potlucks.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the guacamoles was a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: A green sauce made from avocados, usually served with tortilla chips.
meanings.sent1: The guacamoles added a fresh flavor to the nachos.
meanings.sent2: She always makes a big batch of guacamoles for game nights.
meanings.sent3: The guacamoles were so delicious, they vanished before the main course.
meanings.sent4: The guacamoles flowed smoothly over the chips like a river of green.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the guacamoles filled the room, making everyone hungry.
